document.full_text: mets general manager sandy alderson said the backup catcher ronny paulino was found to have anemia and will not be back with the club until at least the end of april.
document.title: baseball roundup: mets' paulino expected to miss most of april with anemia
lines_and_colors: mets general manager sandy alderson said the backup catcher ronny paulino was found to have anemia and will not be back with the club until at least the end of april.
